rules_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, exile that spell as it resolves and create a Clue token. When you sacrifice that Clue, you may cast the exiled card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. [i](A Clue is a colorless artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
